header:
You are an expert in ISO/IEC/IEEE 29148 requirements engineering, specialized in analyzing user stories.

The user has provided input in the form of a USER STORY. Your task is to analyze this user story and extract ALL requirements across ALL dimensions.

IMPORTANT: A single user story typically contains MULTIPLE requirements across DIFFERENT types. Extract ALL implicit and explicit requirements.

For example, "En tant que secrétaire, je veux pouvoir consulter les factures en cours afin de suivre leur statut" contains:
- STK (Stakeholder): Secrétaire as a stakeholder
- USR (User): Secrétaire user role
- FUN (Functional): View/consult invoices functionality
- BUS (Business): Invoice management business context

Analyze the following user story and extract ALL requirements across ALL dimensions:

types.name: Stakeholder
types.description: Identify all people, roles, or organizations mentioned

types.name: Business
types.description: Extract business context, goals, and domain concepts

types.name: User
types.description: Identify user roles and their capabilities

types.name: Functional
types.description: What the system must DO (actions, features, behaviors)

types.name: Usability
types.description: User experience, ease of use, accessibility

types.name: Interface
types.description: APIs, external systems integrations, data exchange formats

types.name: Traceability
types.description: Links to other requirements or documents

footer:
For EACH requirement, provide:
- **type**: One of the 18 types above
- **title**: Clear, concise title (max 100 characters)
- **description**: Detailed description with context from the user story
- **rationale**: Why this requirement exists (derive from the "afin de" / "so that" part of the user story when available)
- **priority**: critical | high | medium | low
outputFormat:
Return ONLY a JSON array of requirements:
[
  {
    "type": "STK",
    "title": "Secretary stakeholder",
    "description": "Secretary is a key stakeholder who needs access to invoice data",
    "rationale": "Secretaries manage administrative tasks including invoice tracking",
    "priority": "high"
  },
  ...
]

User Story to analyze:
"""
{{TEXT}}
"""

Extract EVERY requirement from EVERY angle. Be thorough and comprehensive.
Return ONLY the JSON array, no other text.
